tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EcologicalInteractions (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_one VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  species_two VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  interaction_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    species_1_id INT,
    species_2_id INT,
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EcologicalInteractions (
   interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   species1_id UUID,
   species2_id UUID,
   interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
   interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EcologicalInteractionsHistory (
   history_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
   interaction_id UUID,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   interaction_result VARCHAR(50),
   observation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ecological_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INTEGER REFERENCES species(species_id),
    interaction_id INTEGER REFERENCES interactions(interaction_id),
    habitat_id INTEGER REFERENCES habitats(habitat_id),
    observation_date DATE NOT NULL
);
